title: The banished mans suit for protection to His Excellency the Lord Generall Cromvvell, being the humble address of Lieutenant Colonel John Lilburn.
author: Lilburne, John, 1614?-1657.
publisher: Printed by Tho. Newcomb dwelling in Thamestreet over against Baynards Castle,
notes: Dated at end: From my present lodging in little Moor-fields in London, Tuesday this 14. of June 1653.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
